xml.p: The episode start with a recap of Nate's murder. The team found out about the investigation file leading to Pryon Group, a private security firm. Recapping, to the end of last episode leading to the death of Vale.
At the end of the episode, their car is bombed by a fighter jet and the gang is assumed dead. Sam's final words are "So what the hell do we do now?"
Card is the bad guy after Michael finds Tyler Gray. Gray tells Michael that coming to Panama was a "suicide mission" for Westen.
